mapper.sql: id, shop_id, order_formid, out_trade_no, transaction_id, out_refund_no, total_fee, refund_fee, user_id, `state`, remark, payment_mode,after, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into cere_pay_log
shop_id,
order_formid,
out_trade_no,
transaction_id,
out_refund_no,
total_fee,
refund_fee,
user_id,
`state`,
remark,
payment_mode,
after,
create_time,

#{orderFormid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update cere_pay_log
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_formid = #{orderFormid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_refund_no = #{outRefundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
refund_fee = #{refundFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_mode = #{paymentMode,jdbcType=BIT},
after = #{after,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cere_pay_log set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_formid = #{orderFormid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_refund_no = #{outRefundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, refund_fee = #{refundFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_mode = #{paymentMode,jdbcType=BIT}, after = #{after,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.order_id FROM cere_pay_log a LEFT JOIN cere_shop_order b ON a.order_formid=b.order_formid where a.out_trade_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderFormid},'%') and a.state='支付'
SELECT a.*,b.order_id FROM cere_pay_log a LEFT JOIN cere_shop_order b ON a.order_formid=b.order_formid where a.out_refund_no=#{refundNo} and a.state='支付'
SELECT a.*,b.order_id FROM cere_pay_log a LEFT JOIN cere_shop_order b ON a.order_formid=b.order_formid where a.transaction_id=#{transactionId} and a.state='支付'
